full_threads.body: (Time: 70mins) Dev + Admin time

Hi Greta,

Happy Friday!

We are happy to inform you that we have deployed the updates live.

👉https://syd-proposal.novaricollective.com.au/

Please check and let us know if you have any feedback.

Hi Greta,

That sounds great! I'll forward it to our team and will let you know once completed.

Hi Joy

I have checked with the team and they are happy for it to go live as it is now - thank you!

Kind regards,

Greta Smith

General Manager - Essential Home Services

Johns Lyng Group

M +61 418 122 507

Hi Greta,

Thank you, and looking forward to your response very soon.

Hi Joy

I missed this email - sorry.

I will confirm asap.

Kind regards,

Greta Smith

General Manager - Essential Home Services

Johns Lyng Group

M +61 418 122 507

Hi Greta,

Our apologies. I’ve double-checked my inbox, and it looks like the
only note I received recently was about removing the 20% discount.

Would you mind resending the rest of your requests here? We’ll jump
on them right away.

Warmly,
Joy T
projects@wolfiq.com.au
WOLF IQ PROJECTS TEAM

[1]
Wolf IQ doesn't just fix websites - we can help you...

each month.

minutes.

Hi Greta,

Our apologies. I’ve double-checked my inbox, and it looks like the only note I received recently was about removing the 20% discount.

Would you mind resending the rest of your requests here? We’ll jump on them right away.

Hi Joy

Can you please confirm you received this? I am concerned that my emails aren't getting through…

Thanks

Kind regards,

Greta Smith

General Manager - Essential Home Services

Johns Lyng Group

M +61 418 122 507

Hi Joy

Can you please confirm you received this? I am concerned that my emails aren't getting through…

Thanks

Kind regards,

Greta Smith

General Manager - Essential Home Services

Johns Lyng Group

M +61 418 122 507

Hi Joy

I have sent quite a few emails to you without a response - I am waiting for you to make changes I've requested.

Kind regards,

Greta Smith

General Manager - Essential Home Services

Johns Lyng Group

M +61 418 122 507

Hi Greta,

Hope you are well!

Just checking in to see if you're happy for us to go ahead and deploy the Sydney Proposal updates to live.

Once we get your go-ahead, we’ll jump on it and aim to have everything wrapped up today.

Hi Greta,

Appreciate the quick confirmation.

Hope you have a lovely day!

Looks good thank you

Kind regards,

Greta Smith

General Manager - Essential Home Services

Johns Lyng Group

M +61 418 122 507

Hi Joy

Can I please get an update on these updates?

Kind regards,

Greta Smith

General Manager - Essential Home Services

Johns Lyng Group

M +61 418 122 507
(Time: 15mins)

Hi Greta,

Lovely Monday!

We're happy to let you know that the 20% discount has been successfully removed.

Kindly check if that's all good on your end.

Hi Greta,

Hope you're doing great!

Just a quick note to let you know your request about the Melbourne Proposal copy update has been passed along to our team. We should be able to complete it by Monday.

Thanks so much for your patience—really appreciate it!

Hi Joy

Following up on the below can we get this done today?

Thank you

Kind regards,

Greta Smith

General Manager - Essential Home Services

Johns Lyng Group

M +61 418 122 507

Hi Greta,

The moodboards and the vendor checklist have been updated.

👉https://stg-proposaladvantage-syd.kinsta.cloud/

Please check and let us know if these are all good to deploy to live.

Looking forward to your feedback very soon.

Hi Joy

Yes please do the mood boards.

Also the change to the vendor checklist hasn't been made, it's still behind a click through.

Thank you

Kind regards,

Greta Smith

General Manager - Essential Home Services

Johns Lyng Group

M +61 418 122 507

Hi Greta,

Thank you for sending the TC for Sydney.

We are happy to share the staging for the Sydney Proposal site. Please check the link below:

👉https://stg-proposaladvantage-syd.kinsta.cloud/

Just a few notes:
  • You can use the same WP login in the production environment.
  • We're still working on updating the moodboards.
  • You can send us your feedback on the site overall in the meantime.

Looking forward to your thoughts very soon.

Hi there, please find attached.

Kind regards,

Greta Smith

General Manager - Essential Home Services

Johns Lyng Group

M +61 418 122 507

Hi Greta,

Happy Monday!

Just wondering if you could send through the different TC for Sydney — I had a look but couldn’t find it anywhere on my end.

Looking forward to your response very soon.
